safetyTips: Following government guidelines, staying 2m apart with clear social distancing.
name: ANEMONE BLUE FLORIST
address: Glasshouse 2 The Courtyard. Mersham Le Hatch business village. Hythe Road, Mersham Le Hatch, Ashford. TN25 6NH
description: Local qualified florist based in Mersham. Specialise in wedding floristry as based at the Secret garden! Also offer flowers for any occasion, sympathy flowers, plants and gift shop. We are currently offering a delivery service in and around Ashford. Also have a click and collect service via all social media channels, telephone and our website, where you can order and pay online.
